intro: Halimocnemis belangeri, commonly known as the Belanger's sandwort, is a small, mat-forming flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of southern Africa. Halimocnemis belangeri is adapted to withstand extreme temperatures and is often found in sandy or gravelly soils.
